{{Description|A chest unique to the Veluriyam Mirage. They do not look much different from treasure chests you might found outside, but as one of the items that prove that you have explored this hidden paradise, opening one does impart a rather different sense of accomplishment...|[[Map]] description}}
'''Fascinating Chests''' are [[chest]]s in the [[Veluriyam Mirage]] during the [[Secret Summer Paradise]] event that contain {{Item|Joyeux Voucher|20|x=1}}. They take the form of Common, Exquisite, Precious, and Luxurious Chests.

After using the [[Flowing Joyspar]] or [[Felicitous Joyspar]] Gadgets, they are marked as {{Icon|Fascinating Chest}}.
